entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 63,243Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 150

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn‚Äôt.No explanations, no goodbyes‚Äîjust the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn‚Äôt understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don‚Äôt need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.title: The Twins
entry.summary:
Author: TMRCookie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,665Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 96

Summary: "Hey, where are you? There is a pack meeting." Scott asked."Scotty, something came up.""What?" Scott asked again."They found him." There was silence on the other side of line."You mean they found...""Yeah. They found Thomas." Stiles said.Stiles was living his life when he got a call, one that he wished but never thought would happen. They found his brother.Thomas woke up in a town in Beacon Hills, finding out that he has a family, even more so, a twin brother.Also posted on Wattpad @TMRBrownie

entry.title: ‚Äòcause i‚Äôve been changing (and it seems you‚Äôre changing too)
entry.summary:
Author: whiry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,118Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 30

Summary: The quiet, easy life Derek carved out for himself gets turned upside down when Stiles suddenly and unexpectedly finds out about Derek's not-so-secret crush on him. Though Stiles doesn't seem repulsed by the idea, he definitely has no clue what to do with the information. Derek promptly tries (and horribly fails) to cope, especially when Stiles and Lydia break up and it seems like Stiles is actually flirting back. Derek never signed up for this level of heartache.

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,880Chapters: 23/26Kudos: 299

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega‚Ä¶ Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: from the rooftops
entry.summary:
Author: sterek24 (mooncry89)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,393Chapters: 1/17Kudos: 48

Summary: Stiles Stilinski moved to Poland after the events of the Nogitsune. He's been away from Beacon Hills ever since. Now, several years later, he's back and he's bringing a few familiar faces with him. The Nemeton has been visiting Stiles's dreams, telling him he needs to come home - so that's what he's going to do. Oh, and he's going to rebuild the Hale Pack, too, no matter what True Alpha Scott McCall thinks about that.

entry.title: Stiles Come Home
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceAce281990

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 210,663Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 679

Summary: Stiles was kidnapped from the hospital, hours after being born. He was raised by a misguided spark who thought he was hers and then taken away and placed in foster care. Sheriff John Stilinski had never stopped looking for his son, efforts doubling once his wife died and his son's case went cold. When he gets the call that the woman who had stolen his son had come forward, confessed, and he provides what he needs to prove that Stiles is his son, he is elated, emotional, and scared. What had his son went through all of those years and could he work to be the father he had always wanted to be?And could he answer Stiles' first question. "Are you Batman?"
